The Muzzle of Nemesis

ネメシス(ネメシス)の(の)銃(じゅう)口(こう)NEMESHISU no juukou

AKNP-0008

"And punishment was passed down."

mothy's tenth album centered around the wrath sinner, Nemesis Sudou, released on August 17, 2014. The album is licensed through KARENT and is available on Apple Music, Amazon, and Spotify.

Crossfade · Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. master of the hellish yard
  2. The Muzzle of Nemesis
  3. The Last Revolver [Nemesis Version]
  4. And Then the Girl Went Mad ―Ending Tale on a Moonlit Night―
  5. The Journey of Two Mages ~Great Wall and Watchman~
  6. Blink
  7. Handbeat Clocktower
  8. Flower of the Plateau
  9. Bloodstained Switch
  10. Watching Us

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • The inside of the album features a short piece of prose about someone's intervention in the ending of the world.
  • The beginning of the booklet features prose about the events in Evillious after Nemesis' assassination of Gallerian Marlon.
  • The lyrics pages feature a negative number, indicating how many years before EC 999 the song occurs.
  • The ending of the booklet features a timeline of events from BT 022 to EC 999; EC 999 is labelled as "ta eschata", a Greek phrase meaning both "the doctrine of last things" and "death, judgment, heaven, and hell".
